name: Spinning Gear
description:
It's all about how good you are with drawing circles with your mouse or trackpad.

The goal is to spin around the gear and sustain a speed within the green color range; the game auto-pauses as soon as your cursor goes outside of the game's window.

Overtime, there will be red bars appearing from top and bottom. If you spin too fast or too slow, and it touches these red bars, game over!

In addition, the ideal spin rate changes as time progresses meaning spinning as fast as you can at all times is *not* a good idea!
